keys: Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo

    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>

    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4842</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Bread Worksheet</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo sobre el pan</string>
            <string language="ga">Arán – Bileog Oibre</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Brot-Bogen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau de Pain</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha Do Pão</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro Del Pane</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας ψωμιού</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Worksheet concerned with the baking of bread which also requires students to complete questions on related nutritional information.</string>
            <string language="es">Hoja de trabajo que trata sobre el horneado del pan, también requiere que los estudiantes cumplimenten unas preguntas relacionadas con información nutritiva.</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog oibre a bhaineann le déanamh aráin ina gcaitheannn na daltaí ceisteanna a dhéanamh ar eolas cothaithe bainteach.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Home Economics</string>
            <string language="es">Economía del hogar. Hoja de trabajo</string>
            <string language="ga">Eacnamaíocht Bhaile</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Worksheet</string>
            <string language="ga">Bileog Oibre</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen betroffen mit dem Backen des Brotes, 
welches auch Kursteilnehmer benötigt, Fragen über in Verbindung 
stehende Ernährungsinformationen durchzuführen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau concerné par le traitement au four du 
pain ce qui exige également des étudiants de terminer des questions 
sur l'information alimentaire relative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha concernida com o baking do pão qual requer
também estudantes terminar perguntas em informação nutritiva 
relacionada.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro interessato della cottura del 
pane quale egualmente richiede agli allievi di completare le domande 
sulle informazioni nutrizionali relative.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας ενδιαφερόμενο για το ψήσιμο του ψωμιού
που απαιτεί επίσης τους σπουδαστές για να ολοκληρώσει τις 
ερωτήσεις στις σχετικές θρεπτικές πληροφορίες.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Hauswirtschaft</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Bogen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Économie ménagère</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Tableau</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Economia Home</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Folha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Economia domestica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Foglio di lavoro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οικονομικά "Οικιαών</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Φύλλο εργασίας</string>
          </keyword>
